question: Which Ministry has issued an advisory to all States on “Mandatory action by police in crime against women”?
option1: Ministry of Women and Child Development
explanation:
The Union Home Ministry has issued an advisory to all States on “mandatory action by police in crime against women”. The directions include “Zero FIR”, where an FIR can be filed at any police station irrespective of the jurisdiction area.
The victim shall be examined by a qualified doctor within 24 hours from receiving the information of the offence. The advisory also states that the investigation should be completed within 2 months.
